title: Workplace Affiliation
description: Business Partner to Business Partner Affiliation describes the relationship between two Business Partners.

employingOrganizationId.title: employingOrganization.identifier
employingOrganizationId.description: Internal or External (alternative) Identifier of the Business Partner.

employingOrganizationName.title: employingOrganization.name
employingOrganizationName.description: The (Organisation) Name of the BUSINESS PARTNER.

positionName.title: positionName
positionName.description: BP Affiliation with an affiliation type like employment or contact person may have the Position Name as additional information.
